verse.name: v1
verse.lines: R. (14) I will walk in the presence of God, in the light of the living.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Now I know that God is with me.
In God, in whose promise I glory,
in God I trust without fear;
what can flesh do against me?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: R. I will walk in the presence of God, in the light of the living.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: R. I will walk in the presence of God, in the light of the living.
